News.headline: Tickets: York City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: York City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: York City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers' trip to Bootham Crescent on Saturday 19th November, 3:00pm KO.
News.description:
Ticket Prices:

Ground Standing:
Adult: £18.00
Concessions: £12.00
Under 5s: Free
Fans can convert to covered seating for an extra £1 each (there are a maximum of 330 seats available)

Disabled/Carer:
Adult: £18.00
Concession: £12.00
If in receipt of middle/higher rate DLA/PIP carer ticket, to be admitted free of charge.

Wheelchair/Carer:
Adult: £18.00
Concession: £12.00

Please Note:
-Wheelchair/carer tickets are in the Disabled Enclosure which is shared by home and away fans and is situated towards the away standing section of the ground.
-Concessions are Over 65, Under 16 or Students with a valid NUS card.
